Title: Craft & Wild Things

reviewText: I always liked the craft and that was the main reason why I ordered this. I liked wild things too as there were a few surprises in it that I didn't expect. very satisfied with my purchase.
Title: Craft & Wild Things

reviewText: I had boughten the craft on vhs along time ago and planned to replace it with dvd, and finally did it.
summary: the craft is a great movie
Title: Craft & Wild Things

reviewText: This is a great one, i bought it mostly for THE CRAFT but it ended up been a great buy!!!I'm a big fan of The Craft and Neve Campbell's movies as well.I'd never had the chance to see Wild Things before despite the hype when it first came out.I would recommend both of these movies even if you can't get this double feature (which I highly recommend), you can always get them separately.It was a big surprise for me especially with Wild Things because I found out that it was filmed in Miami, where i currently live :-)))
Title: Craft & Wild Things
